Plot: Mutti is back - and this time she's here full-length! After the success of the scandalous five-part serial »Alle lieben Mutti (Everybody loves Mom)« (2001) it was only a question of time, ...
Title: Mutti - Der Film
Writer: Jörn Hartmann, Klaus Purkart, Ades Zabel, Biggy van Blond
Director: Jörn Hartmann, Klaus Purkart, Biggy van Blond, Ades Zabel
Actors: Ades Zabel, Biggy van Blond, Brenda Morelli, Helga Legrelle
